question_text: I want to map your actual network strength — not just contact count. If you needed something urgent (a technical co-founder, a Swiss SME contract, a platform introduction), who are the three to five people you'd call first?
context: Your network is the fastest path to revenue and partnerships. Understanding who your true connectors are — the people you trust and who trust you — changes how I surface opportunities. Right now I know you have contacts, but I don't know who moves in your orbit.
